home.parrafo-info: I graduated in 2020, my strong point is communications, but I am motivated by programming. I have currently taken a Full-Stack web development bootcamp, I am starting in web projects that use HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, I consider myself an entrepreneur, empathetic, decisive, I adapt easily in work environments. I seek to be able to contribute to companies in solving real-world problems with software.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I graduated from SENA, graduated as a technician and technologist. I completed homologation to finish professional studies, I graduated as a computer engineer at the Universidad Fundación Católica del Norte, I currently work at UESVALLE, a public entity in the IT area. My strong point is not programming, I have currently taken some programming courses and this challenge attracts me, I am acquiring new skills, knowledge and strengthening my professional profile.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem solving, responsible and proactive, I like to learn from others and continually improve myself.

formacion.title: Training
formacion.formacion2: Labor Technician in Programming Skills with Emphasis on Web Applications
formacion.formacion3: Technician and Technologist in computer network installation

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A game where the user must guess the secret word with a certain number of chances. The word is chosen randomly by the program and the user will lose the moment the gallows is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can type a text and the encryptor encrypts it with pre-programmed keys. The encryptor can also decrypt the text.
